Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The Property represents a unique and rare opportunity for industrial users, local or abroad, to acquire a waterside property with existinginfrastructure for the export of bulk-materials. Located along the Straight of Canso, which separates mainland of Nova Scotia from CapeBreton Island, offers a shortcut for vessels sailing between American and St. Lawrence ports, while providing a shelter, deep-water access. See the flyer for more details!

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 280 Henry Paint St, Point Tupper,  NS
280 Henry Paint St, Point Tupper, NS

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Located in the Burnside Business Park, 94 Trider is a standalone industrial building featuring 8,340 sq. ft. and is sited on a 22,401 sq. ft. paved and secure lot. The main floor is comprised of 2,380 sq. ft of office and 3,600 sq. ft. of warehouse. The warehouse component has a clear height 17’6” with a flexible mixture of loading including one dock door and one grade door. The second floor provides for additional offices and a large boardroom/training room. See the brochure for more!
